Date bookmark. Ignore

20 Sep 2013

This is a bookmark for today Friday, September 20, 2013. I want to be able to look back in the nearest future and remember today for an interesting opportunity I got. I am yet to make up my mind. I may not get the chance again. I don't even know how this will turn out yet. Hopefully, I want to look back and smile, knowing I didn't make the wrong decision.
